sys_script.name: Recalculate Score CA

sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_431105_cand_ass_candidate_answers</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_431105_cand_ass_candidate_answers">scoreVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="score" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Recalculate Score CA</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var caUtils = new CandidateAssessmentUtils(); var grCandidateSC = new GlideRecord(caUtils.CANDIDATE_SC); grCandidateSC.addQuery('candidate', current.candidate); grCandidateSC.addQuery('assessment_selection_criteria', current.assessment_selection_criteria); grCandidateSC.query(); if (grCandidateSC.next()){ grCandidateSC.score = caUtils.calculateSCScoreForCBT(grCandidateSC); } grCandidateSC.update(); })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-25 20:59:48</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>c88d48301b08a1101f602f08b04bcbe0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Recalculate Score CA</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Candidate Assessment" source="x_431105_cand_ass">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Candidate Assessment">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_c88d48301b08a1101f602f08b04bcbe0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-28 14:38:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c88d48301b08a1101f602f08b04bcbe0"/> </record_update>
